Text: 3D Desktop ScreenSavers are not Lion Compatible, but Hyperspace, LotsaWater, SkyRocket, and X-Galaxy are.  I wanted to edit the topic to add this info but it didn't let me for some reason.
mechanical clock 3d and aqua 3d r good too. soundsteam(free) can be intriguing for the kids. dolphins look realistic in dolphins 3d. nice upload. thanks.
i would also like to add.. there was an old torrent by the name ultimate mac osx sreensaver collection uploaded by sir jesusshochwave. the best screensavers for mac osx were in it.
Yea, you're right but as far as I see in that torrent, the screensavers are for Leopard.  In this torrent, they are not only for Leopard, but Snow Leopard and Lion as well.
Good collection... Running Lion 10.7.3 and they're all working... Thanx...
I wasn't quite sure if all working on Lion since I'm using SL.  Thanks for the confirmation and you're welcome.

What are you guys doing with the control settings? In game, the controls in training camp are shown, as if you have a xbox controller but if you want to use your computer keyboard, the controls are made for a keyboard with numpad. So what are you guys doing with this?
